short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any website or web application to a native Windows/Linux/Mac/Chrome application, and/or Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PhoneGap for your Desktop applications!
Convert any web application or website to a native Windows/Linux/Mac/Chrome application, and/or Chrome extension.

WebDGap source code is also available on Github - https://github.com/michaelsboost/WebDGap
